title: HOT BARGAINS 6 X Juggling Balls Durable Soft Smooth For Beginners Children And Professionals With Easy Grip Size 5cm / 2inches
features: Package: each package includes 6 juggling balls, each of which is made up of 4 sides of different colors (blue, yellow, red, and green)
Square: juggling balls almost do not roll thanks to their shape - do not jump and make hardly noises
Colourful: the colourful juggling bags are designed in red, blue, green and yellow – great eye-catcher.
Size and weight: each juggling ball is 1.7 ounces in weight, 5 x 5 cm / 2 x 2 inches in size
description: Product Description Juggling Ball Juggling is a physical skill, performed by a juggler, involving the manipulation of objects for recreation, entertainment, art, or sport. Juggling can be the manipulation of one object or many objects at the same time, using one or many hands. Square: Juggling balls almost do not roll thanks to their shape - do not jump and make hard noises Key Functions and Gift Durable and Safe: The outer surface is made of soft and wear-resistant PU material and internal materials are made of foam and ceramic, so it doesn't hurt when you play Functions: Vibrant colors easily attract children's attention, and improve their thinking and moving ability Ideal Gifts for Kids Party Use, Size and Weight Colorful: the colorful juggling bags are designed in red, blue, green, and yellow – great eye-catcher.
